t: Amazon Let Its Drivers’ Urine Be Sold as an Energy Drink | WIRED
s: October 19, 2023 - Amazon sold bottles of urine marketed as an energy drink, a new documentary alleges. The company is said to make it alarmingly easy to sell dangerous items to children.
